song.eTitle: HOLY, HOLY, HOLY -- Isaiah 6 (the Sanctus) and Mark 11, NKJV

verses.verse: "Holy, holy, holy is the Lord of hosts; The whole earth is full of His glory!"
"Hosanna! 'Blessed is He who comes in the name of the Lord!'
"Blessed is the kingdom of our father David That comes in the name of the Lord!
